query:
SELECT
                p.id    AS "id: Uuid",
                p.name,
                p.root_path,
                p.last_updated
            FROM projects_fts fts
            JOIN projects_fts_map m ON m.docid = fts.rowid
            JOIN projects p ON p.id = m.project_id
            WHERE fts.name MATCH ?
            ORDER BY fts.rank ASC
            LIMIT ?
